group_by_gene.description: Group data by gene in Skyline.

precursor_report_template.description: URL template for precursor quality report.

replicate_report_template.description: URL template for replicate quality report.

exclude_replicates.description: List of replicates to exclude from normalization and batch correction

exclude_projects.description: List of Skyline documents to exclude from normalization and batch correction

method.description: Normalization method to use. Options are 'DirectLFQ' and 'median'

batch1.description: Metadata key corresponding to batch level 1. If null, the project name is used as the batch variable

batch2.description: Metadata key corresponding to batch level 2. If null, the project name is used as the batch variable

color_vars.description: Metadata key(s) used to color PCA plots. Can be either string or list. If null, batch and acquisition number are used to color plots.

covariate_vars.description: Metadata key(s) to use as covariates for batch correction. Can be either string or list. If null, no covariates are used.

control_key.description: Metadata key indicating replicates which are controls for CV plots. If null, all replicates are used in CV distribution plot.

control_values.description: Metadata value(s) mapping to control_key indicating whether a replicate is a control.

plot_ext.description: File extension for standalone plots. If null, no standalone plots are produced.

documents.description: A map of Skyline documents and metadata files; file paths can be local file paths or Panorama WebDav URLs

replicate_metadata.description: A WebDav URL or local path to replicate metadata annotations
